website_summaries.verdict: People are mostly positive with the Nike Flex Experience RN 9. This product is deemed suitably lightweight and ready to perform feats of speed and efficient running. Natural gait progression is apparently the name of the game of this model. With the shoe's supportive platform, running can be secure and comfortable at the same time.Fans of road-ready running footwear can enjoy the Flex Experience RN 9.
pros: The Nike Flex Experience RN 9 has a design that is appealing to the eyes, according to several consumers
Several consumers are happy with the lightweight nature of this road running shoe
The midsole unit is said to provide responsive performances
Users are particularly positive about the flexibility of the platform as it allows for natural transitions
Breathability is a trait that people seem to appreciate from this product
cons: A few people believe that the heel part of the in-shoe experience is a bit restrictive
Traction is flimsy with this shoe’s non-rubber outsole, according to several purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Really Narrow
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year-old son has been wearing Nikes for quite a number of years. This is the first pair that we’ve ever gotten that has been too narrow for his foot. And he is a kind of skinny guy with pretty narrow feet to begin with. These are definitely a narrow running shoe. We will be returning them and looking for something else!
customer_reviews.author: C. Teleki

customer_reviews.title: Picture color doesn't match product
customer_reviews.text: Well the color said "Obsidian/Metallic Cool Grey-blac", and the picture on Amazon as seen on many devices (phone and computer) appears to be dark grey/black... However, the shoes upon arrival are clearly navy blue.. Other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nadler

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes but had to return them cause they just weren't fitting right, the side of the shoes were to small and my foot felt like it was hanging off the sides of the shoe and the shoe was too tight on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Although these are comfortable, I had to get half insoles because the toee box slopes so drastically. The graphite color is more of a shiny black, not grey.
customer_reviews.author: MelandOnly

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow soles!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and very comfortable! Like walking on a marshmallow!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but it is very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great, but it is by far the most uncomfortable shoe I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Classic and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! Super lightweight and stretchy. Great for his back!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nike quality shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are my new favorite go to shoes. They fit exactly as expected and they should last me a few years.
customer_reviews.author: John Temple

customer_reviews.title: Look at the length of the size you purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boyfriend in a size 13, because his old pair of Nike's were that size. I am not sure if the ones he had previously ran small or if these run big. Be conscious of the size you order and look at the length instead. He uses these for his job where he works on a roof and wants another pair for when he is not at work.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Butler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I've ever had. I own the blue ones as well. I'm a true 11 and these are like gloves so go to what you really believe you are in size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a Hanukkah gift for my husband and he loved them! He says they are light and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: maria dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Run on small side
customer_reviews.text: My son always wears a Nike 15 - these were too narrow
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dorazio

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I wear an 11 and ordered an 11. I could barely get my foot in to it. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Weber

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for running, only good for walking.
customer_reviews.text: Only good for casual walking and standing. After jogging regularly for 2 months in these my knee started having patella femoral flare ups. Switched over to New Balance and the pain subsided. Being a big Nike running shoe fan during the FREERUN years, these last couple years I've seen some of the most ugly and non functional shoes I have ever seen from the company, on top of them getting into social politics... I've decided to drop them from my buying list of manufacturers. Goodbye Nike! Hello New Balance!
customer_reviews.author: scott parsons

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying these... Best for indoor use only.
customer_reviews.text: Note the flexing soul and how much they would spread apart when stepping. The tread is very deep. Now imagine that they clamp down on every rock and pebble that instantly get wedged deep into the soul. Now imagine spending several minutes each day picking out rocks that are so well wedged it requires a screwdriver to remove them. Oh, you could leave them in there if you want your new nickname to be "Squeeks".
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Flex Experience Rn 9 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Nike Flex Experience Run 9 is designed for movement. The versatile design offers comfort in all conditions The flex grooves in the outsole follow every movement of the foot and thus ensure comfort with every step. The elastic material on the toes ensures absolute freedom of movement when running. The minimalist heel adapts to your foot and ensures stability during the run. The support on the midfoot ensures a snug and comfortable fit. The continuous rubber outsole offers permanent traction.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper is breathable; Supportive midsole for cushioned comfort
Lace-up construction with tab at the tongue; Flex grooves on the outsole for flexible traction
Deconstructed heel forms to your foot
